Pre-Game Insights: The match is considered a derby of the AES (Alliance des Etats du Sahel) and is the sixth confrontation between the two countries in the last 15 years.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will take place in Korhogo, Cote d'Ivoire on January 30, 2024.
Others: The Mali team has won 4 games and drawn 1 against Burkina Faso in their previous encounters. Burkina Faso is still seeking a victory over Mali.
